src:
Hasil Pertandingan Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus: Skor 1-2
07 Nov 2019, 03:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus sukses menuai poin penuh saat melawat ke markas Lokomotiv Moscow dalam laga lanjutan Liga Champions pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari tadi. Skuat besutan Maurizio Sarri tersebut menang dengan skor tipis 2-1.
Tambahan tiga poin membuat posisi Juventus di puncak klasemen tetap aman. Sementara itu, Lokomotiv Moscow harus puas menduduki posisi ketiga dengan koleksi tiga poin saja.
Juventus langsung memimpin saat pertandingan baru berjalan tiga menit! Berawal dari tendangan bebas Cristiano Ronaldo yang gagal diselamatkan Guilherme, Aaron Ramsey melihat bola liar dan dengan segera menyambarnya untuk disarangkan ke dalam gawang. 1-0.
Sayangnya, keunggulan tersebut tidak bertahan lama. Lokomotiv berhasil menyamakan kedudukan melalui aksi Aleksey Miranchuk. Penyerang berumur 24 tahun itu menyambar bola yang memantul setelah sundulannya membentur tiang gawang. 1-1.
Pertandingan berlanjut dengan sengit. Meski kalah secara materi pemain, namun Moscow tidak gentar dalam menghadapi pemain Juventus. Bahkan mereka sempat memberikan tekanan bertubi-tubi kepada juara bertahan Serie A tersebut.
Perlahan, Juventus mulai mengambil alih permainan. Namun mereka belum mampu menyarangkan bola lagi ke gawang tuan rumah. Alhasil, skor imbang 1-1 pun bertahan sampai wasit mengakhiri babak pertama.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus results: Score 1-2
Nov 7 2019, 03:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus successfully reaped full points when a visit to the headquarters of Lokomotiv Moscow in the Champions League continued match on Thursday (11/07/2019) early this morning. Maurizio Sarri's squad won with a thin score of 2-1.
An additional three points to make the position of Juventus at the top of the standings remain safe. Meanwhile, Lokomotiv Moscow had to settle for third place with just three points.
Juventus immediately took the lead when the match had only been running for three minutes! Starting from Cristiano Ronaldo's free kick that Guilherme failed to save, Aaron Ramsey spotted the ball wildly and immediately grabbed it into the net. 1-0.
Unfortunately, these advantages did not last long. Lokomotiv managed to equalize through the actions of Aleksey Miranchuk. The 24-year-old striker struck the bouncing ball after his header hit the post. 1-1.
The match continued fiercely. Despite losing in terms of players, Moscow is not afraid to face Juventus players. In fact they had to give a barrage of pressure on the defending champions of Serie A.
Slowly, Juventus began to take over the game. But they have not been able to nettle the ball again into the host's goal. As a result, the 1-1 draw score lasted until the referee ended the first round.
